CAREER OBJECTIVE

opportunity to learn. My personal and professional growth should be in tandem with the organization.

Certified in Software Testing Training in ISTP (manual testing, QTP & Selenium).

oAllstate, BMW, Mini, AT&T, Verizon and Mercedes Roadside Customers.

Car break down, Battery Jump start, Fuel Delivery, Flat tire change.
